quotes.text: The opposite of love is not hate, it's indifference...
quotes.author: Elie Wiesel

quotes.text: Never doubt that a small group of thoughtful, committed citizens can change the world...
quotes.author: Margaret Mead

quotes.text: How wonderful it is that nobody need wait a single moment...
quotes.author: Anne Frank

quotes.text: Man is a mystery. It needs to be unraveled...
quotes.author: Fyodor Dostoevsky

quotes.text: I cannot make you understand... what is happening inside me.
quotes.author: Franz Kafka

quotes.text: I never wish to be easily defined... transparent, paradoxically iridescent creature.
quotes.author: Franz Kafka

quotes.text: I have a deeply hidden and inarticulate desire...
quotes.author: Virginia Woolf

quotes.text: What is the meaning of life? ... little daily miracles...
quotes.author: Virginia Woolf

poems.author: Emily Dickinson
